title: A Man's Way of Life! Zoro's Techniques, Usopp's Dream
short_summary: This episode is a flashback to Zoro's rescue from Captain Axe Hand Morgan and Usopp's island being saved from Kuro by Luffy. They both connect their situations to Robin's.
long_summary: A reporter visits the Straw Hat Pirates crew to interview them about what food on the ship was like before Sanji joined.
